text: "AIS code confirmed. Greetings $playerName. My directive is to protect your assets in this system."

options: 0:boggledConsiderExtremeWeatherConditionImprovement:Consider making the weather patterns on $marketName less extreme
0:boggledConsiderMildClimateConditionImprovement:Consider making the weather patterns on $marketName mild

script:
